content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (no other mining drills found) 

### Copper cable factory
No entities found that would suggest the existence of a copper cable factory

### Electricity generator at position(117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5 y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(63.5, -53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner equipment without fuel
- Make sure to provide fuel for burner equipment before using them
- Check the status of burner equipment regularly to avoid running out of fuel

### Errors when using inserter without source items
- Ensure that the inserter has access to source items before attempting to use it
- Check the status of the inserter regularly to avoid waiting for source items

### Errors when using furnace without ingredients
- Ensure that the furnace has the necessary ingredients before attempting to use it
- Check the status of the furnace regularly to avoid running out of ingredients

### Errors when using steam engine without being connected to a pipe
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a pipe before attempting to use it
- Check the status of the steam engine regularly to avoid connection issues

### Errors when using electricity group without being plugged into an electric network
- Ensure that the electricity group is plugged into an electric network before attempting to use it
- Check the status of the electricity group regularly to avoid connection issues

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables have been defined or invoked in the provided execution logs.
